"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547645b263687273ee540200#post_547645b263687273ee540200
I have a feeling when black mesa, the final version, gets released people are going to "we were waiting two years *just* for this?"

It's probably why half-life 3 is probably going to come out not for several more years/never cause everyone at valve is probably going, "well shit; we can't possibly live up to everyone's expectations for the game".  It's probably why they never tried to make a half-life 1 remake cause they knew they couldn't possibly live up to the hype.


To use a analogy think of it as like how the brony fandom has been slowly stagnating the last couple years after season 2; after season 2 everyone had such massive hype for the next season that anything that was less than perfect couldn't live up in their eyes.  Eventually hype reaches the point where a company can't live up to it cause fans think that anything that isn't shakespeare that can last for centuries popularity wise is "t3h worstest thing evah!"

Another analogy is like how we were talking about digimon last night.  After Tamers everyone had such massive hype for the next season that frontier had no chance cause in their eyes anything less than perfection was utter shit.

Or like Touhou; the fandom is slowly stagnating cause after Subterranean Animism(11'th game) anything that wasn't perfect was utter shit in their eyes.

"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547664d4636872211b170100#post_547664d4636872211b170100
The blue code of silence.

It's not that cops in the usa has some sinister plan to cause shit like this, rather a long standing problem is that very rarely do police stand up against whenever their coworkers do something inappropriate or against the rules.  There's laws against the blue code of silence, but it's a long standing issue that's been around for ages.

If I had to summarize the problem with usa cops in a nutshell is:
cop #1, "dude; you can't just speed and use your siren cause you want to get back to the station quicker to get home faster"
cop #2, "are you going to tell on me?  What are you a snitch?"
